$(l)Source:$() Obtained from $(l:world/ores#malachite_ore)Malachite Ore$() through crushing. $(br2)$(l)Uses:$() Smelted in a blast furnace to yield copper ingots. Can craft a decorative block and green dye.

$(l)Source:$() Obtained from $(l:world/ores#malachite_ore)Malachite Ore$() through crushing. $(br2)$(l)Uses:$() Smelted in a blast furnace to yield copper ingots. Can craft a decorative block and light blue dye.
